trends.name: Remote Work Tools
trends.description: Software for managing remote teams and virtual workspaces.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Develop a user-friendly platform with advanced features for remote collaboration.

trends.name: Artificial Intelligence
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create customizable AI models for industries with high growth potential, such as healthcare and finance.

trends.name: Plant-based Foods
trends.description: Alternatives to meat and dairy products using plant-based ingredients.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Innovate plant-based meat and dairy substitutes with improved taste, texture, and nutritional value.

trends.name: Healthcare Wearables
trends.description: Wearable devices tracking health metrics and providing personalized insights.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Design stylish and affordable healthcare wearables with advanced monitoring capabilities.

trends.name: Green Energy Solutions
trends.description: Renewable energy systems and energy-efficient technologies for homes and businesses.
trends.Startup_Opportunity: Create innovative green energy products for mass adoption, such as solar panel roof tiles or wind turbines.
